burnFToken(uint256,uint256,address).details: It is responsible for burning the fToken supplied by the user and returning yield to the user.

depositPrincipal(uint256).details: The Strategy owner can choose to implement a fee but the resulting "locked" principal the user should expect  after the stake has ended must be returned.

returns._0: amount of principal tokens that are currently deposited
amount of yield tokens that can be rewarded in SUSHI
how many aLP rewards should be returned if _amount fERC20 tokens are burned

returns.amountFToken: how many fTokens should be minted for a given _amount and _duration (in seconds)

burnFToken(uint256,uint256,address).notice: This is the function the user will be calling when performing a FlashBurn.

depositPrincipal(uint256).notice: This function will be called whenever a user stakes via the Flash Protocol.

fToken().notice: address of fERC20 for this strategy

withdrawPrincipal(uint256).notice: This function should withdraw principal from the underlying strategy.
